text: Digau ma ga aali, le e ulu nia gahu kene beenei, gei Au hagalee daa nadau ingoo gi daha mo di beebaa hagamouli. Au ga haga modongoohia haga madammaa i mua dogu Damana mo ana gau di langi bolo digaula la nia daangada ni aagu.3.5 Exodus 32.32-33; Pisalem 69.28; Hagagida 20.12; Matthew 10.32; Luke 12.8
